main-text:
b o n u s   l e v e l 

[yellow]move mick or mack left & right to 
catch the falling garbage consisting
of paper, bottles, & cans. 

position your kid in front of the 
correct bin & press a,b,or C to throw 
the piece of garbage that you are 
carrying into that bin. 

the bins are marked to show what type 
of garbage should be recycled in each.

only one piece of garbage can be
carried at once.

the level ends when a piece of garbage
comes to rest on the ground.

[red]Oh yeah, watch out for the anvils...[/]

[blue]Press any button
